#library
```{r library}
library(tidyverse)
```

#import data
```{r import data}
url <- "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/torra034-svg/biostats/refs/heads/main/Biostats%202/Data%20Stuff/tomhs.csv"

tomhs <- read_csv(url)
```


#data cleaning
```{r remove values1}
rm(url)
```


```{r}
tomhs <- tomhs %>% 
  mutate(wtchg = wt12 - wtbl,
         cholchg = chol12 - cholbl)
```

#Questions
